thread.title: That Makeup Artist Who Almost Sued Kylie Jenner Is Now Collaborating With Smashbox
thread.title_full: That Makeup Artist Who Almost Sued Kylie Jenner Is Now Collaborating With Smashbox

author: Victoria Messina
title: That Makeup Artist Who Almost Sued Kylie Jenner Is Now Collaborating With Smashbox
text:
Smashbox Cosmetics Be Legendary Liquid Lip That Makeup Artist Who Almost Sued Kylie Jenner Is Now Collaborating With Smashbox March 10, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 That Makeup Artist Who Almost Sued Kylie Jenner Is Now Collaborating With Smashbox 
Remember Vlada Haggerty , the LA-based makeup artist who almost sued Kylie Jenner for copying her artistic lip-dripping designs back in November? Well, it looks like she hasn't let that controversy slow her down one bit, as she just teamed up with Smashbox Cosmetics for a new line of Be Legendary Liquid Lip products . Naturally, she also crafted jaw-dropping lip art looks using the brand-new products, and man, are they a beaut! 
These metallic liquid lip gels are high in shine — no mattes here! — and have a mirror-like finish. With one quick swipe, the highly saturated colors permeate your lips, giving you full coverage and a gloss-like sheen that makes you ready for an Instagram-worthy selfie — no filter required. 
The lip goodies come in nine gorgeous shades and are now available on Smashbox.com and at Sephora, Ulta, Macy's, and Nordstrom for $24 each. Read on to see each shade of the lip gel itself, followed by the artistic pouty masterpieces Vlada created for this collection.
